title: Symmetric Difference Based on Function
description: In this lab, we explore the concept of symmetric difference between two lists in Python, and implement a function that computes the symmetric difference after applying a given function to each element in the lists.

meta.title: Python | Symmetric Difference | Function Application | Lab
meta.description: Learn how to find the symmetric difference between two lists in Python, after applying a provided function to each element. Improve your programming skills with this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: Python, Symmetric Difference, Function Application, List Operations, Programming Tutorials

verify.name: Verify Symmetric Difference By Python Script
